ygData.subject: Re: 9th Level Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: a Dark Elf doesn t have enough mana??? This somehow seems wrong..... Dark Elves should have plenty of mana at level 9. Tulwump ... From:	Robert Porter
ygData.messageBody:
a Dark Elf doesn't have enough mana??? This somehow seems wrong..... Dark Elves should have plenty of mana at level 9.

Tulwump

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert Porter [SMTP:frog42@...]
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 3:21 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] 9th Level Pet

From: Robert Porter <frog42@...>

I'm a dark elf shadowknight who's recently reached level 9. I purchased the Leering corpse spell and memorized it, but then i find i don't have enough mana to cast it, even when i'm at full. Does this happen to everyone? Do i have to wait til level 10 to use a 9th level spell?

KaiInnoruuk
